title: How to Make Brown Sugar Pancakes

steps.headline: Combine the brown sugar and eggs and whisk until you get a creamy mixture.
Mix in the milk and flour.
steps.description: Add in the butter, baking powder, and vanilla. Whisk thoroughly.

steps.headline: Spray non-stick cooking spray or use a knob of butter in a large skillet and heat over a medium high heat.
Pour about 1/4 cup of the pancake batter into the skillet.
steps.description: Wait until the top forms bubbles, flip the pancakes, and cook until browned as desired.

text: Combine the brown sugar and eggs and whisk until you get a creamy mixture.  Mix in the milk and flour. Add in the butter, baking powder, and vanilla. Whisk thoroughly. Spray non-stick cooking spray or use a knob of butter in a large skillet and heat over a medium high heat.  Pour about 1/4 cup of the pancake batter into the skillet. Wait until the top forms bubbles, flip the pancakes, and cook until browned as desired. Finished.
